name: Fast Empathy
description: Your empathic attunement to nature connects you swiftly with bestial minds.
prerequisites: Handle Animal 5 ranks, wild empathy class feature.
benefit: Using wild empathy is a standard action for you.
mythicDescription: You can soothe the emotions of wild beasts with nearly supernatural quickness.
mythicBenefit: You can use wild empathy as a swift action.
description_zh: 你野兽般的灵魂使得你可以快速理解野兽的思想。
prerequisites_zh: 驯养动物5级，【野性认同】职业特性。
benefit_zh:
野性认同只需要花费你一个标准动作。

通常状况：野性认同需要花费1分钟。
